import React from "react"; import { Button } from '../ButtonElement'; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, Column1, Column2, ImgWrap, Img, InfoRow, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, SubTitle, BtnWrap, } from './InfoElement.js'; const InfoSection = ({lightBg,id,imgstart}) => { return (
{topLine} {headline} {description}
); }; export default InfoSection;
